subject: PROTECTION RITUAL FILE POSTED
author: bhali333
full_text:
everyone,

I have written up the short protection ritual I use before every 
session, I have been using it for quite a while now and have had no 
problems with dark heads other than the occasional curse word.

I recommend that all researchers experienced and new use this or a 
similar protection ritual before every box session if you are not 
already. 

hey it's better to have it and not need it , than need it and not have 
it!

I will post it in the files section in a folder marked 
"protection ritual"

Thanks guy's

Bruce
